summary: The "Remembering Our Local Heroes Act" directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish a grant program for the construction, restoration, renovation, and maintenance of memorials honoring veterans, law enforcement officers, and firefighters. Grants will be awarded to local governments and nonprofits, with priority to projects demonstrating strong community support. The bill defines "covered memorials," sets a matching fund requirement, caps individual grants at $100,000, and authorizes $2 million in appropriations annually for fiscal years 2026-2030.
